function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inequality in physical exercise among college students","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inhibited social interaction health problems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced physical activity during covid-19 may lead to higher levels of loneliness, sadness, and anxiety.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gender differences in exercise behavior during the pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction people","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on mental health and exercise behaviors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on remote or face-to-face supervision for exercise","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of social support may lead to decreased physical activity, impacting overall health
